**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 42 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 40 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 37 [Hooktongue](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2239) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 97 **Perception** +25; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Aquan](/Languages.aspx?ID=14); (can't speak any language) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +28, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +27 **Str** +8 **Dex** +5 **Con** +5 **Int** -3 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +0 **Slow Metabolism** Hooktongue can go for 10 years without feeding. After this, its hunger makes it [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) but doesn't otherwise impact its lifespan. If Hooktongue is slowed as a result of starvation, it can remove this condition by using Swallow Whole to gulp down a meal.
**Undetectable** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) Hooktongue automatically tries to counteract any [detection](/Traits.aspx?ID=43), [revelation](/Traits.aspx?ID=138), or [scrying](/Traits.aspx?ID=141) [divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47) attempted against it, using its [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) modifier for the [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check. --- **AC** 35 **Fort** +27 **Ref** +25 **Will** +23 **HP** 275 **Resistances** [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 15, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 15 --- **Speed** 20 feet, swim 50 feet **Melee** jaws +30 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d12+14 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Melee** tongue +30 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 25 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d8+14 piercing plus Hooktongue Venom **Capsize** ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) Hooktongue attempts to capsize an aquatic vessel of its size or smaller that it's adjacent to. It must succeed at an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check with a DC of 35 or the pilot's [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) DC, whichever is higher. **Hooktongue Venom** ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 34; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 2d6 poison damage and [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) (1 round); **Stage 2** 3d6 poison damage, clumsy 1, and [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) (1 round); **Stage 3** 4d6 poison damage, clumsy 2, and confused (1 round) **[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) Large, 2d10+10 bludgeoning, Rupture 28 **Poison Spray** ([Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) Hooktongue sprays poison from its throat in an 80-foot line that deals 15d6 poison damage (DC 34 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). A creature that fails or critically fails this save is exposed to Hooktongue Venom as well. Hooktongue can't use Poison Spray again for 1d4 rounds. **Water Travel** ([Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157), [Water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)) Hooktongue dissolves into water, appearing only as a long, serpentine silhouette on the waves. While in this form, Hooktongue's swim Speed increases to 600 feet, it automatically succeeds at [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to Swim, and it gains a +4 circumstance bonus to [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks in water. Hooktongue can remain in this form for 8 hours but can't enter salt water when using this ability. Hooktongue can return to its normal form using a single action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait.
name: Hooktongue
